pageContext.claim: “I have asked Secretary of State @SecPompeo to closely study the South Africa land and farm seizures and expropriations and the large scale killing of farmers. “South African Government is now seizing land from white farmers.” @TuckerCarlson @FoxNews”
pageContext.analysis: The president’s first claim about land seizures has some merit but is mostly false. Trump’s second claim, that South African farmers are being killed on a “large scale,” is a fiction not supported by data. We have no clue how this myth about farmers being killed ended up on the president’s Twitter feed. But it has been swishing in the alt-right and white-nationalist ether for years.
